import axios from "axios" import { useState } from "react" import "./addedit.css" const initialState = { name: "", email: "", country:"", contact:"", } export const AddEdit = () => { const[data, setData]=useState(initialState) const {name,email,country,contact}= data const createUser = async(data)=>{ const res= await axios.post("http://localhost:5000/users",data) if(res.status === 200){ window.confirm(res.data) } } const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() if(!name, !email, !country, !contact){ window.confirm } } const handleInputChange = (e)=>{ const {name, value}= e.target } return (
) }
